title: Colnago C68 Gravel First Ride Review: Italy’s Finest Handmade Carbon Bike Goes Off-Road
content:
Colnago's C68 series has expanded to three models with the introduction of the Gravel.

Read the full article at Colnago C68 Gravel First Ride Review: Italy’s Finest Handmade Carbon Bike Goes Off-Road on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
